channel.title: Raniox -- A revolution
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.logomaker.com/logo-images/e972c8c0648273a0.gif[/img][/center] [center][font=Papyrus][size=15pt]A Revolution -- Created by Rich Dude99[/size][/font][/center] [center][b]Offical Website can be found in my Signature![/b][/center] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]The Mission:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Raniox is a revolution of its kind, a new innovation in the Private Server Community. Raniox brings forth new experiences, new monsters, new storylines, and an overall sucessful gameplay. Consisting of the majority of working skills, Raniox will unveil itself as a clean slate welcoming members of all kinds.[/font][/size] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]The Innovation:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Raniox will cater to all the needs of its players, providing working, challenging skills for dedicated gameplayers. Whilest focusing on minigames, quests, and combat to provide different aspects of gameplay for its diverse members.[/font][/size] [center][size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Support Raniox:[/font][/size][/center] [center][url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=Raniox][img]http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/image.php?id=Raniox[/img][/url][/center] [center][size=8pt][font=Arial Narrow]Click [url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=Raniox](here)[/url] or the bar, above, to add your support to the Raniox Revolution.[/font][/size][/center] [hr] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Update Log:[/font][/size] [code]Updates may be very simple to very complex, all significant updates are logged. November 16th: Forums November 15th: Added ticket system in dungeon. Added npc face direction. November 14th: Added npcs in dungeon. Added npc face direction. November 13th: Combat Improved. Fishing Base Started. November 10th: Added Wizards Tower Added Duel Arena Implemented Dungeon Implemented Teleporting November 9th: Worked on Dungeon. Worked more on Server-Wide Movement November 8th: Working Dones (all) Server-Wide Teleporting Initated. November 7th: Started a NPC Dialogue System Completed NPC Dialogue System Started Class Choice System Completed Class Choice System November 6th: Woodcutting Added Woodcutting Store + Trees Added Working Doors (more) Magic Touch-Ups -- Finished Magic Store Added Make-Over-Mage Added Working Character Design Interface More Monsters Added November 5th: Shopping/Store System Refined Working Doorhandler Added Global Objects Flax Picking & Spining Duel Arena Refined November 4th: Working Banking Monsters Added 2H Weapons/Items Created Duel Arena Started November 3rd: Worked on Combat Skills Alching (High/Low) & Telegrab Basic Following System Implemented November 2nd: Monster Drop System Implemented Worked on Combat Skills Special Attacks Expanded on Logging System to Log Majority of Player Actions November 1st: Basic Equiptment Requirements Implemented Finished Packaging Worked on Combat Skills Server Base Features: Login System Multi-Player Capabilities Thread-per Client Start to Combat Skills Saving and Loading Most Npc Update Masks Most Player Update Masks Basic Chat Logging Basic Stability Raniox is based off of a clean version of Emulous.[/code] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Skill Log:[/font][/size]
[size=10pt][font=Arial Narrow][b]Key:[/b] Not Started In Progress Completed
[size=10pt][font=Arial Narrow][b]Progession Log:[/b] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/5/5e/Woodcutting.gif[/img]Woodcutting [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/1/14/Mining.gif[/img]Mining [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/4/4e/Cooking.gif[/img]Cooking [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2f/Fletching.gif[/img]Fletching [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/3/38/Fishing.gif[/img]Fishing [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/d/d6/Agility.gif[/img]Agility [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/7/7e/Runecrafting.gif[/img]Runecrafting [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/f/f6/Crafting.gif[/img]Crafting [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2b/Smithing.gif[/img]Smithing [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/e/e8/Thieving.gif[/img]Thieving [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/d/d1/Firemaking.gif[/img]Firemaking [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/9/92/Herblore.gif[/img]Herblore [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2f/Slayer.gif[/img]Slayer [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/b/bd/Magicicon.png[/img]Magic [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/f/fb/Attack.gif[/img]Melee Skills [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/7/7b/Ranged.gif[/img]Range [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/9/94/Prayer.gif[/img]Prayer *These are the basic skills that the server will start with, before more skills are added. **Farming will most likely not be implemented.[/font][/size]
[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Media:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Offical Raniox Media Releases will be available below, when applicable: November 16th Pictures: [i](Different Direction Facing NPC's)[/i] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/107s3sn.jpg[/img] [i](Working Lock)[/i] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/muvseu.jpg[/img] [i](More NPC's)[/i] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/uog20.jpg[/img] [i](Amazing Ticket System/Object Clicking)[/i] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2l9782b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2dlrsc9.jpg[/img] November 7th Pictures: [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/239y79.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/11j7mfa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/vq3910.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2whhybm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/33z7fck.jpg[/img][/font][/size]
[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Helping Out:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Do you share simmilar ideas? Do you like Raniox? Do you think it has a future that you wish to share? Raniox is allowing experienced programmers to help, if you would like to apply to join, simply send [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=73187]Rich Dude99 a private message[/url]. We are looking for motivated, excited, creative, and experienced people to join. Help out today![/font][/size] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Credits:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]-Me -Hayzie (For Cleaned Version of Emulous) -Moparscape (Inspiration) -R-Server (Few Tutorials) -Moparscape (Few Tutorials).[/font][/size] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Suggestions/Praise:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Have a suggestion? Wish to provide Raniox with inspiration or praise? If you post a response regarding one of those two questions, your post may be featured here. Thank you for the positive feedback/encouragement:font][/size] [quote="Scully"]Very nice, I will be following this thread for sure. I like what you have going so far. ;D[/quote] [quote="Anfernio"]Another fact - Finally a server where people know common grammar and don't make dialogue like: [quote=Most servers where people have no common knowledge of English.]HEY How R U ? my Name is +npcName+, im hear 2 help u .![/quote][/quote] [size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Support Us:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Wish to support us further? Place the following in your signature![/font][/size] [code][url=http://raniox.netai.net/index.php][font=Papyrus][size=12pt]I Support! Raniox -- A Revolution[/size][/font][/url][/code]

item.title: Raniox -- A revolution
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Thank you everyone for the amazing positive feedback.

[hr]

pk3r john:

Really nice, good luck with this. What base are you using?

I am using a modified emulous base, which was reduced featurewise and edited for stability purposes.

[hr]

Scape-JAVA:

I forgot to say rep++

Thank you, it was appreciated tremendously.

Read full topic

item.title: Raniox -- A revolution
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Another fact - Finally a server where people know common grammar and don’t make dialogue like:

HEY How R U ? my Name is +npcName+, im hear 2 help u .!

Read full topic

item.title: Raniox -- A revolution
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][font=Papyrus][size=15pt]A Revolution – Created by Rich Dude99[/size][/font][/center]

[center]Offical Website can be found in my Signature![/center]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]The Mission:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Raniox is a revolution of its kind, a new innovation in the Private Server Community. Raniox brings forth new experiences, new monsters, new storylines, and an overall sucessful gameplay. Consisting of the majority of working skills, Raniox will unveil itself as a clean slate welcoming members of all kinds.[/font][/size]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]The Innovation:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Raniox will cater to all the needs of its players, providing working, challenging skills for dedicated gameplayers. Whilest focusing on minigames, quests, and combat to provide different aspects of gameplay for its diverse members.[/font][/size]

[center][size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Support Raniox:[/font][/size][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][size=8pt][font=Arial Narrow]Click url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=Raniox[/url] or the bar, above, to add your support to the Raniox Revolution.[/font][/size][/center]

[hr]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Update Log:[/font][/size]

[code]Updates may be very simple to very complex, all significant updates are logged.
November 16th:
Forums

November 15th:
Added ticket system in dungeon.
Added npc face direction.

November 14th:
Added npcs in dungeon.
Added npc face direction.

November 13th:
Combat Improved.
Fishing Base Started.

November 10th:
Added Wizards Tower
Added Duel Arena
Implemented Dungeon
Implemented Teleporting

November 9th:
Worked on Dungeon.
Worked more on Server-Wide Movement

November 8th:
Working Dones (all)
Server-Wide Teleporting Initated.

November 7th:
Started a NPC Dialogue System
Completed NPC Dialogue System
Started Class Choice System
Completed Class Choice System

November 6th:
Woodcutting Added
Woodcutting Store + Trees Added
Working Doors (more)
Magic Touch-Ups – Finished
Magic Store Added
Make-Over-Mage Added
Working Character Design Interface
More Monsters Added

November 5th:
Shopping/Store System Refined
Working Doorhandler Added
Global Objects
Flax Picking & Spining
Duel Arena Refined

November 4th:
Working Banking
Monsters Added
2H Weapons/Items Created
Duel Arena Started

November 3rd:
Worked on Combat Skills
Alching (High/Low) & Telegrab
Basic Following System Implemented

November 2nd:
Monster Drop System Implemented
Worked on Combat Skills
Special Attacks
Expanded on Logging System to Log Majority of Player Actions

November 1st:
Basic Equiptment Requirements Implemented
Finished Packaging
Worked on Combat Skills

Server Base Features:
Login System
Multi-Player Capabilities
Thread-per Client
Start to Combat Skills
Saving and Loading
Most Npc Update Masks
Most Player Update Masks
Basic Chat Logging
Basic Stability
Raniox is based off of a clean version of Emulous.[/code]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Skill Log:[/font][/size]

[size=10pt][font=Arial Narrow][b]Key:[/b] Not Started In Progress Completed
[size=10pt][font=Arial Narrow][b]Progession Log:[/b] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/5/5e/Woodcutting.gif[/img]Woodcutting [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/1/14/Mining.gif[/img]Mining [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/4/4e/Cooking.gif[/img]Cooking [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2f/Fletching.gif[/img]Fletching [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/3/38/Fishing.gif[/img]Fishing [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/d/d6/Agility.gif[/img]Agility [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/7/7e/Runecrafting.gif[/img]Runecrafting [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/f/f6/Crafting.gif[/img]Crafting [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2b/Smithing.gif[/img]Smithing [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/e/e8/Thieving.gif[/img]Thieving [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/d/d1/Firemaking.gif[/img]Firemaking [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/9/92/Herblore.gif[/img]Herblore [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/2/2f/Slayer.gif[/img]Slayer [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/b/bd/Magicicon.png[/img]Magic [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/f/fb/Attack.gif[/img]Melee Skills [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/7/7b/Ranged.gif[/img]Range [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/9/94/Prayer.gif[/img]Prayer *These are the basic skills that the server will start with, before more skills are added. **Farming will most likely not be implemented.[/font][/size]
[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Media:[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Offical Raniox Media Releases will be available below, when applicable:

November 16th Pictures:
(Different Direction Facing NPC’s)

107s3sn.jpg765×498

(Working Lock)
muvseu.jpg764×499

(More NPC’s)

(Amazing Ticket System/Object Clicking)
2l9782b.jpg762×497

2dlrsc9.jpg757×496

November 7th Pictures:

239y79.jpg765×530

11j7mfa.jpg766×531

vq3910.jpg759×532

2whhybm.jpg766×530

33z7fck.jpg516×582
[/font][/size]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Helping Out:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Do you share simmilar ideas? Do you like Raniox? Do you think it has a future that you wish to share? Raniox is allowing experienced programmers to help, if you would like to apply to join, simply send Rich Dude99 a private message. We are looking for motivated, excited, creative, and experienced people to join. Help out today![/font][/size]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Credits:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]-Me
-Hayzie (For Cleaned Version of Emulous)
-Moparscape (Inspiration)
-R-Server (Few Tutorials)
-Moparscape (Few Tutorials).[/font][/size]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Suggestions/Praise:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Have a suggestion? Wish to provide Raniox with inspiration or praise?
If you post a response regarding one of those two questions, your post may be featured here.

Thank you for the positive feedback/encouragement:font][/size]

Scully:

Very nice, I will be following this thread for sure. I like what you have going so far. ;D

Anfernio:

Another fact - Finally a server where people know common grammar and don’t make dialogue like: [quote=Most servers where people have no common knowledge of English.]HEY How R U ? my Name is +npcName+, im hear 2 help u .![/quote]

[size=15pt][font=Arial Black]Support Us:[/font][/size]
[size=13pt][font=Arial Narrow]Wish to support us further? Place the following in your signature![/font][/size]

[url=http://raniox.netai.net/index.php][font=Papyrus][size=12pt]I Support! Raniox -- A Revolution[/size][/font][/url]

Read full topic
